Posts.Content: similar to you I had lumpectomy on 28th Jan and waiting to start Chemo which should be next week or week after It is driving me mad I feel I have no control over anything at the moment. Stay positive and im sure we will come out the other end stronger people take care mo
Posts.Title: Vascular Invasion.... anyone had it?

Posts.Content: Hi kat Stay positive i know its not easy I had a biopsy on xmas Eve and get the results on 3rd jan i have been to hell and back Its the not known part thats hard. Use this site and dont go searching the internet for information you will send yourself round the bend. Take care and good luck Mo
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: Sent you a private message but not sure if it went Mo
Posts.Title: Weird & Wobbly

Posts.Content: Hi finaly having op tomorrow afternoon been told that they lump has attached itself to one place and not spread although terrified of general anthestic freaking me out more than the cancer at the moment i have high blood pressure and on 3 tablets for it which does keep it under control
Posts.Title: Op tomorrow

Posts.Content: Thanks guys for your good wishes will be kept in overnight but will letvyou know how it all goes
Posts.Title: Op tomorrow

Posts.Content: Had op yesterday back home feeling a bit groggy at times but on the whole doing well Consultant says he is 95 percent sure all is clear from what they could see under microscope appointment on the 11th Feb for pathologist report so feeling very positive only wee problem i have this annoying tingling feeling on the tip of my tongue almost like the numbness you feel when at dentist
Posts.Title: Op tomorrow

Posts.Content: hi thankyou that's what I thought I have a bit of tingling in my little finger
Posts.Title: Pain in back of hand and wrist

Posts.Content: Hi Wonder if anyone can help had lumpectomy 3 weeks ago sailed through it no problem didn't even need pain killers when i came home. However yesterday morning woke up with a pain in the back of my hand and wrist not sore to move just tender. Its not the hand where i had any drips in, but is the same side as breast lumpectomy not aware of banging it or anything like that it basicaly came out of no where could this have anything to do with lumpectomy. On a good note when i got my report all margins lymph nodes etc clear now waiting to see oncologists for what future treatment will be thanks in advance to any replies to this post
Posts.Title: Pain in back of hand and wrist

Posts.Content: Im going to see doc tomorrow as there is a lump there although seems to be better as day goes on im sure its nothing but im not quite passed the paranoid stage. All my lymp nodes were clear and also good clear margins. But still worrying myself sick
Posts.Title: Pain in back of hand and wrist

Posts.Content: Hi I had my op on the 28th jan and nothing had spread to lymp nodes etc my oncologist agreed to let me go on my 3 week family holiday brfore starting chemo and i don't see him until 15 th April so looks like or time scale is about the same.so dont worry im sure all will be fine says me thats a basket case lo,
Posts.Title: diagnosis to chemo starting...worried
